title: Add pretrained models to Ludwig
body:
**Describe the bug**
I'm new at Ludwig but I used the image classification example with my own images and the model never swayed from 50% accuracy.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. pip install https://github.com/uber/ludwig/archive/master.zip
2. ludwig experiment --data_csv image_class.csv --model_definition_file image_class.yaml
3. Learning stops after about 14 epochs and accuracy never changes from 0.5000

IMAGE_CLASS.YAML
===============
input_features:
    -
        name: image_path
        type: image

output_features:
    -
        name: class
        type: category

IMAGE_CLASS.CSV
==============

**Expected behavior**
Accuracy should increase up into the 90 percentile
**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Environment (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: MacOS
 - Version 10.13.6
- Python version 3.6.0
- Ludwig version: Latest

**Additional context**
Prediction based on the model created is inaccurate. Predicted that a photo of chickens was a photo of a husky with 96% accuracy.
